channel.title: ZestFlow AI Changelog
channel.description: Product updates, new features, and improvements for ZestFlow AI

item.title: v2.4.0 - ServiceTitan Deep Integration
item.description: Direct ServiceTitan integration with real-time job creation, automatic technician assignment, two-way sync, and custom field mapping.

item.title: v2.3.0 - Advanced Routing Intelligence
item.description: ZIP code-based routing, time-of-day rules, VIP customer detection, and Spanish language support for SMS.

item.title: v2.2.0 - Payment Processing & Deposits
item.description: Integrated Stripe payment processing, automatic deposit collection via SMS, customizable deposit amounts, and payment retry logic.
